head.title: Change of Posts At FCB Worldwide

hedline.hl1: Change of Posts At FCB Worldwide

abstract.p: Richard Gagnon is named executive vice president and media director at New York office of FCB Worldwide, suceeding Ellen Oppenheim (S)

block.p: Richard Gagnon has been named executive vice president and media director at the New York office of FCB Worldwide, part of True North Communications. He succeeds Ellen Oppenheim, who is taking an extended personal leave of absence, the agency said. Ms. Oppenheim, 46, is one of the best-known media directors specializing in the print media. Mr. Gagnon, 38, had been the senior vice president and media director overseeing FCBi, the direct marketing and interactive unit of FCB.
